languages.text: На протяжении нескольких часов из Святилища Навигатора приходили тревожные вести — якобы в пучине Моря Душ мелькает огромная тень, следующая за кораблем. За считанные часы до выхода в реальный мир пустотный корабль содрогнулся — неизвестное огромное чудовище, явившееся из варп-бездны, обхватило судно своими щупальцами и начало сжимать хватку, пытаясь раздавить корпус словно скорлупу!

traits.locale_text: На протяжении нескольких часов из навигационных палат приходили тревожные вести — якобы в пучине Моря Душ мелькает огромная тень, следующая за кораблем. За считанные часы до выхода в реальный мир пустотный корабль содрогнулся — неизвестное огромное чудовище, явившееся из варп-бездны, обхватило судно своими щупальцами и начало сжимать хватку, пытаясь раздавить корпус словно скорлупу!

languages.text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.
languages.original_text: На протяжении нескольких часов из Святилища Навигатора приходили тревожные вести — якобы в пучине Моря Душ мелькает огромная тень, следующая за кораблем. За считанные часы до выхода в реальный мир пустотный корабль содрогнулся — неизвестное огромное чудовище, явившееся из варп-бездны, обхватило судно своими щупальцами и начало сжимать хватку, пытаясь раздавить корпус словно скорлупу!

traits.locale_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the navigation chambers over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the ship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace the void vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around it and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg

Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

languages.text: 在过去的几天里，导航者圣所传来了令人不安的消息。报告声称，某个巨大的阴影跟着虚空舰一起穿过了灵魂之海深处。在即将返回真实世界的几个小时前，舰船内发生了剧烈颤动。一头正体不明的巨兽从翻滚的亚空间中冲了出来，触手紧紧地缠绕住飞船，猛力挤压着，打算像捏碎鸡蛋一样将舰船化为齑粉。
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

traits.locale_text: 在过去的几天里，导航者圣所传来了令人不安的消息。报告声称，某个巨大的阴影跟着虚空舰一起穿过了灵魂之海深处。在即将返回真实世界的几个小时前，舰船内发生了剧烈颤动。一头正体不明的巨兽从翻滚的亚空间中冲了出来，触手紧紧地缠绕住飞船，猛力挤压着，打算像捏碎鸡蛋一样将舰船化为齑粉。

languages.text: En los últimos días han llegado noticias inquietantes del sanctum de Navegantes. Al parecer, una enorme sombra sigue a la nave del vacío por las profundidades del Mar de Almas. Apenas unas horas antes de emerger en el espacio real, la nave se estremeció: un leviatán no identificado emergió de la turbulenta disformidad, envolvió la nave con sus tentáculos y empezó a apretar, intentando romper el casco como un huevo.
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

traits.locale_text: En los últimos días han llegado noticias inquietantes del sanctum de Navegantes. Al parecer, una enorme sombra sigue a la nave del vacío por las profundidades del Mar de las Almas. Apenas unas horas antes de emerger en el espacio real, la nave se estremeció: un leviatán no identificado emergió de la turbulenta disformidad, envolvió la nave con sus tentáculos y empezó a apretar, intentando romper el casco como un huevo.

languages.text: ここ数日、航宙士のサンクトゥムから不穏なニュースがポツポツと届いている…報告によると、魂の海の奥底からヴォイドシップを尾けるかなりの大きさの影がいると言う。リアルスペースへ出るほんの数時間前、船が震えた…未確認のリヴァイアサンが渦巻く<歪み>から姿を現し、船体に触手を巻き付けて、卵を割るかのように船体を締め付け始めた。
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

traits.locale_text: ここ数日、航宙士室から不穏なニュースがポツポツと届いている…報告によると、魂の海の奥底からヴォイドシップを尾けるかなりの大きさの影がいると言う。リアルスペースへ出るほんの数時間前、船が震えた…未確認のリヴァイアサンが渦巻く<歪み>から姿を現し、船体に触手を巻き付けて、卵を割るかのように船体を締め付け始めた。
ここ数日、航宙士室から不穏なニュースがポツポツと届いている…報告によると、魂の海の奥底からヴォイドシップを尾けるかなりの大きさの影がいると言う。リアルスペースへ出るほんの数時間前、船が震えた…未確認のリヴァイアサンが渦巻く<歪み>から姿を現し、船体に触手を巻き付けて、卵を割るかのように船体を締め付け始めた。

languages.text: Depuis quelques jours, des nouvelles inquiétantes arrivent du sanctum de navigation. Il semblerait qu'une ombre gigantesque suive le vaisseau à travers la Mer des Âmes. À peine quelques heures avant l'entrée dans l'espace réel, le vaisseau s'est mis à trembler après qu'un léviathan a émergé du Warp tourbillonnant, s'agrippant au navire de ses tentacules afin de le briser comme une vulgaire coquille de noix.
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

traits.locale_text: Depuis quelques jours, des nouvelles inquiétantes arrivent du sanctum de navigation. Il semblerait qu'une ombre gigantesque suive le vaisseau à travers la Mer des Âmes. À peine quelques heures avant l'entrée dans l'espace réel, le vaisseau s'est mis à trembler après qu'un léviathan a émergé du Warp tourbillonnant, s'agrippant au navire de ses tentacules afin de le briser comme une vulgaire coquille de noix.

languages.text: Aus dem Navigator-Sanctum sind in den letzten Tagen immer wieder beunruhigende Nachrichten eingetroffen. Angeblich verfolgt ein riesiger Schatten das Raumschiff durch die Tiefen des Meers der Seelen. Nur Stunden vor Erreichen des Realraums erzitterte das Schiff plötzlich. Ein nicht identifizierter Leviathan war aus dem brodelnden Warp aufgetaucht, hatte seine Tentakeln um das Schiff gelegt und begonnen zuzudrücken. Offenbar wollte er den Rumpf knacken wie ein Ei.
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.

traits.locale_text: Aus den Navigationskammern sind in den letzten Tagen immer wieder beunruhigende Nachrichten eingetroffen. Angeblich verfolgt ein riesiger Schatten das Raumschiff durch die Tiefen des Meers der Seelen. Nur Stunden vor Erreichen des Realraums erzitterte das Schiff plötzlich. Ein nicht identifizierter Leviathan war aus dem brodelnden Warp aufgetaucht, hatte seine Tentakeln um das Schiff gelegt und begonnen zuzudrücken. Offenbar wollte er den Rumpf knacken wie ein Ei.

Aus den Navigationskammern sind in den letzten Tagen immer wieder beunruhigende Nachrichten eingetroffen. Ein nicht identifizierter Leviathan war aus dem brodelnden Warp aufgetaucht, hatte seine Tentakeln um das Schiff gelegt und begonnen zuzudrücken. Offenbar wollte er den Rumpf knacken wie ein Ei.

languages.text: Rotacı'nın Kutağı'ndan son birkaç gündür huzursuz edici haberler sızıyor. İddiaya göre Ruhlar Denizi'nin derinliklerinde uçsuz gemisini takip eden devasa bir gölge var. Gerçekuzayda ortaya çıkmadan birkaç saat önce gemi baştan sona zangırdadı. Tanımlanamayan bir dev, çalkalanan öteboyuttan çıkarak dokunaçlarını geminin etrafına sardı ve sıkmaya başlayarak geminin gövdesini yumurta misali çatlatmaya çalıştı.
languages.original_text: A trickle of disturbing news came from the Navigator's Sanctum over the last few days — allegedly there is a vast shadow following the voidship through the depths of the Sea of Souls. Mere hours before emerging in realspace, the vessel shuddered — an unidentified leviathan had emerged from the roiling warp, wrapped its tentacles around the ship, and started squeezing, trying to crack the hull like an egg.
